name: Spacebowl's
description:
Proximity themed game about Lawn bowl, Astroids and gravitational pull of Blackholes in Space.
Throw your astroids at the blackhole and get points the closer they get. The more astroids there are in the orbit, the more points you get.

We also wanted to add a timer, and "ammunition" but the programmer got sick in the last day, and I have NO clue how "unity" works, so... have fun~ or not~
